function.name: get_wakeup_timers
function.description: Retrieves a list of all active wakeup timers. You can optionally provide a message parameter to filter timers by their associated messages. When specifying the message parameter, you can use regular expressions (regex) to match patterns within the timer messages. This is useful when you want to find timers with specific keywords or patterns in their messages. For example, to retrieve all timers containing the word 'hello', you can use the regex '.*hello.*', where the dot-star (.*) pattern matches any character sequence.

message.description: wakeup message of timers to be retrieved.  regex values are accepted.
